availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Floyd County, Indiana, clerk. Native of Ireland. Son of John P. Cromie and Eliza Cromie. Clerk in Floyd County, Indiana, in 1860. Clerk in Floyd County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Indiana, Floyd County, New Albany Ward 3, p. 46.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville Ward 10, p. 302A.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Floyd County, IN, June 1863, p. 99.
Kentucky, Wills and Probate Records, 1774-1989, Kentucky County, District, and Probate Courts, Jefferson County Wills, vol.20-21, 1895-1898, p. 338-9.
"Isaac Cromie (1839-1896)," Find A Grave, Memorial #142106291, accessed September 19, 2021, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/142106291.
